messages.title: Delivering Change for Torridge and West Devon
messages.content: As a local councillor, school governor, teacher and mother I have the skills and drive needed to deliver change for Torridge and West Devon.

messages.title: Why I'm backing Siobhan Strode
messages.content: "I am pleased Labour has selected someone with the youth and passion to deliver the change we need in Torridge and West Devon. For too long we have been left behind and ignored by the arrogance of Conservative politicians who believe they have the right to rule without serving our community."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I led the campaign in Torridge for Fair Funding for our schools and took a delegation to London to lobby MPs. As a teacher & governor, I know the daily challenges our schools and children face; and I strive to protect the mental wellbeing of all our children.

We need to act now to ensure that we can preserve an environment that provides for our needs. We can provide jobs and make Britain energy independent again if we fully exploit our offshore sustainable energy potential. Building offshore wind turbines or tidal flow turbines could provide a huge boost to jobs.

Labour has pledged the biggest house building programme since the second world war to meet the dual challenge of homelessness & adapting to the zero carbon economy. Labour will bring back council house building, give private tenants more rights to challenge landlords & insulate 29 million homes across Britain.
